title: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, 72"L x 24"W x 2/5 Inch Thick; color: teal
descriptions:
Introducing the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat! This premium mat is designed to enhance your yoga, Pilates, and floor exercise routines. 

The mat boasts a generous length of 72 inches, a width of 24 inches, and a thickness of 2/5 inch, providing ample space and cushioning for all your movements. It is made from high-quality NBR foam, ensuring durability and comfort during your workouts. 

With its vibrant teal color, the Gaiam Essentials Yoga Mat adds a touch of style to your fitness sessions. Weighing just 3.11 pounds, it is lightweight and easy to carry, making it convenient for on-the-go use.

The Gaiam Essentials Yoga Mat is not just about its dimensions and materials. It also offers a range of features to enhance your exercise experience. The extra-thick construction provides superior support and joint protection, allowing you to push yourself further. The soft cushioning adds an extra layer of comfort, making your workouts more enjoyable.

To top it all off, this yoga mat comes with an included easy-cinch yoga mat carrier strap. This convenient strap allows you to effortlessly transport and store your mat, making it perfect for those who are always on the move.

Invest in the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat to elevate your fitness routine. Whether you're a yoga enthusiast, a Pilates devotee, or simply looking for a comfortable mat for floor exercises, this mat is the perfect choice. Get yours now and experience the difference it makes in your workouts!

With its dimensions of 72 inches in length and 24 inches in width, this mat provides ample space for your fitness routine. The mat is made from NBR foam, ensuring durability and comfort during your workouts. 

The 2/5 inch thickness of this mat offers extra cushioning and support, giving you the perfect balance between comfort and stability. The soft cushioning provides a gentle surface for your joints and prevents any discomfort during your exercises.

This mat comes in a stylish teal color, adding a touch of vibrance to your workout sessions. The mat weighs only 3.11 pounds, making it lightweight and easy to transport.

The Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat is suitable for various activities, including yoga, Pilates, and floor exercises. Whether you're practicing your poses or performing core workouts, this mat is designed to meet your fitness needs.

One of the standout features of this mat is its inclusion of a convenient carrier strap. With the included easy-cinch yoga mat carrier strap, you can effortlessly carry your mat to and from your workout sessions. No need to worry about the hassle of carrying your mat separately.

Invest in the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat and experience the perfect blend of comfort, durability, and convenience. Elevate your fitness routine with this essential yoga mat today!
